text: Um Reifenbreite is a bicycle racing themed board game for two to four players. It was invented by Rob Bontenbal. ==Awards== *Spiel des Jahres Game of the Year 1992 *Deutscher Spiele Preis 1992 2nd place ==References== ==External links== * *Um Reifenbreite at Cyclingboardgames.net *Rules of Um Reifenbreite at GameCabinet.com *Review by Tom Vasel (Dice Tower) Category:Spiel des Jahres winners
title: Um Reifenbreite
